latest_games.title: Sovereign Syndicate: Digital Deluxe Edition v1.0.19 + Bonus Content
latest_games.rating: 100% of user reviews are positive (based on 25 reviews)

minimum_requirements.directX: Direct X Compatible Video Card with 2GB

latest_games.description: Explore an open world in this Victorian steampunk cRPG. Play as three characters with branching stories that intertwine. Investigate, interact, and take action to leave your mark on the world and its inhabitants. No random stat points here, use your skills to level them up, and trust your fate to our tarot card chance system.

latest_games.description: Discover the Smell of the Game with Guilty Gear -Strive-! Immerse yourself in new gameplay mechanics designed to be simple and welcoming for fighting game newcomers, yet deep and creative for veterans. Ride the Fire into a heavy metal inspired alternate future full of over-the-top action, style and fun! Blazing.

games.title: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown v1.0.2
games.user_language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish (Spain), Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Arabic, Persian
games.description: Dash into a stylish and thrilling action-adventure platformer set in a mythological Persian world where the boundaries of time and space are yours to manipulate. Play as Sargon and evolve from sword-wielding prodigy to extraordinary legend as you master acrobatic combat and unlock new Time Powers and unique super abilities.

games.description: Dakar Desert Rally is the biggest and most epic off-road rally racing adventure ever developed. Dakar Desert Rally captures the genuine speed and excitement of Amaury Sport Organisation’s largest rally race on the planet, featuring a wide variety of licensed vehicles from the world’s top makers, including motorcycles, cars, trucks, quads and SSV

games.title: Zombie Army 4: Dead War
games.user_language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Brazilian (Portuguese), Russian, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
games.description: Hitler’s hordes are back for more in this spine-chilling shooter from the makers of Sniper Elite 4! Abominable occult enemies, epic weapons and a harrowing new campaign for 1-4 players await in 1940s Europe, as you fight to save humankind from undead Armageddon!
